code: import React from'react';import{Formik,Form,Field,ErrorMessage}from'formik';import*as Yup from'yup';import*as API from'../utils/API';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var schema=Yup.object().shape({originalURL:Yup.string().url('Not a valid URL-address!')});export var URLShortener=function URLShortener(_ref){var className=_ref.className;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:className,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"URL Shortener"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Here you can enter some long URL-address to get short one."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Formik,{initialValues:{originalURL:''},validationSchema:schema,onSubmit:function onSubmit(values){API.getShortener(values.originalURL).then(function(res){if(res.data.short_url){console.log("Your shortener: ",res.data.short_url);}else{console.log("Sorry");}}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});},children:function children(_ref2){var handleSubmit=_ref2.handleSubmit,errors=_ref2.errors;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Field,{type:"text",name:"originalURL",placeholder:"http://www.example.com"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMessage,{name:"originalURL"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Get Short"})]});}})]});};
